author: stsp
msg: (wrap_4to3_dir_opened): Accept the new SKIP_CHILDREN parameter which
was added to dir_opened in r946186. Just set it to FALSE if not NULL,
because the callbacks3 version of this callback doesn't know any better.

author: pquerna
msg: LIBCLOUD-37: Add the exit_status of a script to the ScriptDeployment class.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Bump some dependencies to newer versions.
Also, switch to using GNU iconv because I had trouble running the swig
bindings tests using APR-iconv (some weird problem with loading APR-iconv's
shared library modules with dlopen which only happened during the bindings
tests for some reason). APR-iconv can still be used if preferred by
toggling a flag at the top of the Makefile.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1159: Easy way to customize search locations for page and component templates

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1159: Refactor TEMPLATE_EXTENSION from InternalConstants to the new TapestryConstants class
